title: LFT Season 3 AU & NZ ESL Tournament.

embed.description: After a year filled with highlights, it's time for the ESL AU&NZ Championships to charter some unexplored territory in our final season for 2017 with League of Legends joining the ranks of Counter-Strike:Global Offensive and Rocket League as a main title.

body:
Quick post, Looking for a team in medium diamond plus. I can scrim most nights and can usually make time. 

IGN: Minigorophin
